name: Objects & Economies - Untitled Projects: 1997-2007
description:
Conrad Bakker / Objects & Economies, Untitled Projects: 1997-2007
Exhibition catalog for the survey exhibition at the Des Moines Art Center, full color, 82 pages + cover, 4 1/4 x 7 x 1/4 inches. Features an introduction by Patricia Hixson, catalogue essay by Kelly Baum, and project descriptions and images by Conrad Bakker. (signed)

name: Untitled Project: Seasonal Economies
description:
Conrad Bakker / Untitled Project: Seasonal Economies 2012
Exhibition catalog for solo exhibition at the BCA Center, Burlington Vermont. Full color, 82 pages + cover, 7x 10 x 1/4 inches. Features an introduction by curator Steve Budington, an interview with Conrad Bakker by Steve Budington, and a catalogue essay by Miriam Kienle. Includes images and descriptions of four singular projects designed for the exhibition plus additional works. (signed)

name: Untitled Project: Souvenir [Miami]
description: Untitled Project: Souvenir [Miami], 2003 is a limited edition postcard featuring an image of carved and painted sculptures of miami/flamingo souvenir salt and pepper shakers installed and left in a thrift store in Champaign, Illinois. This printed matter was sold during the Art Basel Miami art fair as an official souvenir postcard. (signed/numbered)

name: Free Drawing
description:
Hand drawn images of the word "FREE"  
pen/pencil on paper, dimensions variable
- free with any catalog purchase
- individual purchase: $1.00 for S&H
